
0.4.0 / 2012-05-19 
==================

  * Added stdin support
  * Added alias --update as update
  * Added alias --list as "list" and "ls"
  * Added --update-self
  * Added `list`
  * Fixed: remove html tags

0.3.0 / 2012-04-18 
==================

  * Added mad.conf support

0.2.0 / 2012-04-14 
==================

  * Added `--update` to fetch pages from the repo

0.1.0 / 2012-04-14 
==================

  * Added __MOD_PATH__ support. Closes #1

0.0.1 / 2012-04-14 
==================

  * Initial release
